title: Barbarian Outpost Agility Course

Barbarian Outpost Agility Course
Released12 December 2002 (Update)
MembersYes

Otto's Grotto

The Barbarian Outpost Agility Course is an Agility training area located in the Barbarian Outpost, available to players with level 35 Agility. Access to this course requires completion of the Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl miniquest.

The Agility course rewards 153.3 Agility experience per completed lap. With an average time of 32 seconds per lap (49 ticks if using additional clicks for tick-perfect), it is possible to get upwards of 18,000 Agility experience per hour from this course. At lower Agility levels expect to get around 11,000-14,000 Agility experience per hour, depending on concentration levels.

Contents

  • 1 Introduction
  • 2 Getting there
  • 3 Strategies
    • 3.1 Clothing
    • 3.2 Inventory
  • 4 The course
  • 5 Experience rates
  • 6 Trivia

Introduction[edit | edit source]

The Barbarian Outpost Agility Course requires level 35 Agility and completion of Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl to access. The Agility course consists of eight obstacles that players can pass in return for Agility experience. If all obstacles are passed in the correct order, some bonus experience is rewarded at the end of the lap. Some of the obstacles can be failed by the player, resulting in small amounts of damage. Failed obstacles have to be tried again before going for the next obstacle, in order to become eligible for the bonus experience at the end of the lap. Players with higher Agility have a higher success rate at passing the obstacles, with players unable to fail obstacles at level 93.

Getting there[edit | edit source]

  • Teleport to the Barbarian Assault minigame using the grouping teleport, requiring completing the tutorial of the minigame.
  • Teleport to the Barbarian Outpost using a games necklace.
  • Teleport to the Barbarian Outpost by casting the Barbarian Teleport spell. This spell is on the Lunar spellbook and requires level 75 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy to cast.
  • Use the shortcut to the north-east of the Grand Tree in the Gnome Stronghold, which requires level 37 Agility.
  • Walk north from East Ardougne.

Strategies[edit | edit source]

Clothing[edit | edit source]

  • Wear weight-reducing clothing to achieve a weight of 0 kg or lower. This results in a lower run energy depletion rate.

Inventory[edit | edit source]

  • Bring some food to restore lost Hitpoints from taking damage from failing Agility obstacles.
  • Obstacle damage scales with current hitpoints so only eat at low health.
  • Bring enough Energy-restoring items for enough energy to constantly run around the course.

The course[edit | edit source]

A map of the Barbarian Outpost Agility Course.
Image Obstacle Experience
Ropeswing 22
Log balance 13.7
Obstacle net 8.2
Balancing ledge 22
Ladder 0
Crumbling wall 13.7
Crumbling wall 13.7
Crumbling wall 13.7
N/A Course Completion Bonus 46.3
Total 153.3

Experience rates[edit | edit source]

Due to the success rate of the obstacles, the experience rates scale with the player's Agility level. At higher levels, a player can complete a maximum of around 120 laps per hour (49 ticks per lap), resulting in about 18,400 Agility experience per hour. A tick-perfect lap without running is 58 ticks. Tick-perfect laps require manually running to specific tiles between some of the agility obstacles.

At lower Agility levels with realistic rates, expect to get around 11,000-14,000 Agility experience per hour.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Only one player may use a rope swing at any one time.

The '''Barbarian Outpost Agility Course''' is an Agility training area located in the [[Barbarian Outpost]], available to players with level 35 [[Agility]]. Access to this course requires completion of the {{SCP|Quest}} [[Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl]] [[miniquest]].

The Agility course rewards 153.3 Agility [[experience]] per completed lap. With an average time of 32 seconds per lap (49 ticks if using additional clicks for tick-perfect), it is possible to get upwards of 18,000 Agility experience per hour from this course. At lower Agility levels expect to get around 11,000-14,000 Agility experience per hour, depending on concentration levels.

==Introduction==
The Barbarian Outpost Agility Course requires level 35 Agility and completion of {{SCP|Quest}} [[Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl]] to access. The Agility course consists of eight obstacles that players can pass in return for Agility experience. If all obstacles are passed in the correct order, some bonus experience is rewarded at the end of the lap. Some of the obstacles can be failed by the player, resulting in small amounts of damage. Failed obstacles have to be tried again before going for the next obstacle, in order to become eligible for the bonus experience at the end of the lap. Players with higher Agility have a higher success rate at passing the obstacles, with players unable to fail obstacles at level 93.

==Getting there==
*Teleport to the [[Barbarian Assault]] minigame using the [[grouping]] teleport, requiring completing the tutorial of the minigame.
*Teleport to the [[Barbarian Outpost]] using a [[games necklace]].
*Teleport to the Barbarian Outpost by casting the [[Barbarian Teleport]] spell. This spell is on the [[Lunar spells|Lunar spellbook]] and requires level 75 [[Magic]] and completion of {{SCP|Quest}} [[Lunar Diplomacy]] to cast.
*Use the [[shortcut]] to the north-east of the [[Grand Tree]] in the [[Gnome Stronghold]], which requires level 37 Agility.
*Walk north from [[East Ardougne]].

==Strategies==
===Clothing===
*Wear [[weight-reducing clothing]] to achieve a weight of 0 kg or lower. This results in a lower run energy depletion rate.

===Inventory===
*Bring some [[food]] to restore lost [[Hitpoints]] from taking damage from failing Agility obstacles.
*Obstacle damage scales with current hitpoints so only eat at low health.
*Bring enough [[Energy#Energy-restoring items|Energy-restoring items]] for enough [[energy]] to constantly run around the course.

==Experience rates==
Due to the success rate of the obstacles, the experience rates scale with the player's Agility level. At higher levels, a player can complete a maximum of around 120 laps per hour (49 [[RuneScape clock|tick]]s per lap), resulting in about 18,400 Agility experience per hour. A tick-perfect lap without running is 58 ticks. Tick-perfect laps require manually running to specific tiles between some of the agility obstacles.

At lower Agility levels with realistic rates, expect to get around 11,000-14,000 Agility experience per hour.

*Only one player may use a rope swing at any one time.
